items.sentence: Who do you think is the best coach in the NFL?
Who drives better, your father or your mother?
Who was the most notorious con man in history?
Who would you rather go out with, Tom or John?
I\'d like to find out when Tom\'s birthday is.
The dog followed its master, wagging its tail.
The engine will stop when you push the button.
The fish Tom caught this afternoon were trout.
The furniture in this office is really modern.
The girl wearing the blue coat is my daughter.
Everybody wanted to know why Tom quit his job.
Everyone has their own strong and weak points.
Everyone says the view from here is beautiful.
I usually don\'t drink red wine in the summer.
I usually don\'t make these kinds of mistakes.
I\'ll never treat you the way Tom treated you.
I\'ll pass along your compliments to the chef.
I\'ll remain your ally no matter what happens.
I\'ll take the responsibility on my shoulders.
I\'ll tell you the rest of the story tomorrow.
I\'ll try to explain both sides of this issue.
Tom told us Mary\'s condition hadn\'t changed.
I was hoping Tom would help me load the truck.
I was just going to ask you the same question.
I was still asleep when Tom left this morning.
I was surprised that Tom spoke French so well.
You should pay more attention to what you say.
You should take advantage of this opportunity.
You should write it down before you forget it.
You were supposed to be helping Tom, you know.
I expect everything will go according to plan.
I feed my cat every morning and every evening.
I feel much better today than I did yesterday.
I forgot to write the address on the envelope.
I go to the library two or three times a week.
I had to walk there because my car broke down.
I thought you and Tom didn\'t like each other.
I thought you didn\'t want to talk about this.
Tom\'s house is warm inside even on cold days.
Too bad Tom isn\'t here to show us what to do.
Tom doesn\'t speak French and I don\'t either.
There\'s a good chance that he\'ll be elected.
The picnic was called off because of the rain.
The police treated Tom like a common criminal.
The rich grow richer and the poor grow poorer.
The runner jumped over the hole in the ground.
The situation is a lot worse than we imagined.
I\'d like to go with you, but I really can\'t.
When I got home, I found I had lost my wallet.
I suppose you want to ask me where I\'ve been.
